description.narrative: Output 3.2 Justice and administrative bodies are able to facilitate children's access to justice services and redress mechanisms, which contributes to Access To Justice. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2022, disadvantaged children and their families utilise equitable access to justice and social services to prevent and respond to violence, discrimination and family separation

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 3.2 Justice and administrative bodies are able to facilitate children’s access to justice services and redress mechanisms

description.narrative: 680 children have received specialized legal aid to enhance their access to equitable and child-friendly justice in criminal, administrative and civil proceedings, with UNICEF support. At the same time, UNICEF contributed to the development of policies and legislation to establish a more comprehensive justice for children system and the development of a social services adapted to the rights and needs of children, who come in contact with the law. The new State Programme on Justice for children 2020-2030, which was developed with the support of UNICEF, has been sent for approval to the Parliament. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:27/01/2020

title.narrative: Information on child rights in justice proceedings is available to all children in modelling districts
Provision of quality legal aid to children in criminal, civil, administrative proceedings at no cost

baseline.value: Limited to children in conflict with the law

target.value: 2022:Expanded to children witness and victims of crime and to children in civil, administrative proceedings at no cost

actual.value: 2019:Expanded to all children after the revision of law on free legal aid

title.narrative: Draft NPA on CRPD implementation available
Existence of specialized justice for children systems, such as capacity building and standards-setting within criminal and civil justice systems

actual.value: 2019:On line course will need to be updated based on the recent amendments and therefore expected to be utilized afterwards
